name: Balls n walls
description:
Balls 'n walls

Made for Nokia 3310 Game Jam 2.

Jam theme: Death is good.

My take: It most certainly is.

Get the ball to where it needs to be, or die trying.

10 levels 1 Bonus level.

Controls:

  • Up/down - arrows
  • Select/shoot - spacebar
  • Back - Q

This is my first jam! Yippee!

Enjoy!

David.
